tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MalwareEvents (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE,
    correlation_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ThreatIntelligence (
    correlation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    related_malware_type TEXT,
    threat_category TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES MalwareEvents(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Correlation (
    correlation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    threat_id INT,
    correlation_score FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES MalwareEvents(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (threat_id) REFERENCES ThreatIntelligence(threat_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MalwareEvent (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_description TEXT,
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    malware_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Correlation (
    correlation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id UUID,
    correlation_score FLOAT,
    correlation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ThreatIntelligence (
    intel_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    intel_source VARCHAR(255),
    intel_description TEXT,
    intel_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE EventCorrelation (
    correlation_id UUID,
    intel_id UUID,
    correlation_strength FLOAT,
    is_matched BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE correlations (
    correlation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    correlated_event_id INT,
    correlation_score FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES malware_events(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (correlated_event_id) REFERENCES malware_events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE malware_samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name VARCHAR(100),
    sample_hash VARCHAR(50),
    threat_actor_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (threat_actor_id) REFERENCES threat_actors(threat_actor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE incident_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_description TEXT,
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    threat_actor_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (threat_actor_id) REFERENCES threat_actors(threat_actor_id)
);
